messages.content: I am not aware of anyone named Vanessa Lagardette with a public profile. Without more information, I cannot confirm whether or not I know this person.

A Scrum Master is a role in the Agile software development methodology. The Scrum Master is responsible for facilitating the Scrum process and serving the Development Team. The primary focus of the Scrum Master is to ensure the Scrum process is being followed and to remove any impediments that may be preventing the team from delivering a product increment. The Scrum Master also helps the team improve their process and working agreements. The Scrum Master is not the project manager and is not responsible for the product's technical aspects or content. The Scrum Master's role is to create an environment in which the Development Team can work together effectively to deliver a product increment.
make a linkedin post about the 6 month training in an cohort called road of mastery lead by serious scrum

"Exciting news! I've recently completed a 6-month training program called the Road of Mastery, led by Serious Scrum. This cohort-based program provided me with in-depth knowledge and hands-on experience in Agile Scrum methodologies. I learned from industry experts and had the opportunity to network with like-minded professionals. I highly recommend this program to anyone looking to enhance their skills in Agile development and Scrum mastery. #SeriousScrum #RoadOfMastery #Agile #Scrum #ProfessionalDevelopment"
